agency_desc: A nonprofit agency offering a twelve-step program to help people stop eating compulsively.
service_description: Offers a 12-Step support group for people who desire to stop eating compulsively. No fees, dues, or weigh-ins. Meetings are offered in-person, online, by telephone, or non-real-time.
site_details: Visit the website for meeting times, locations, and contact information. -- Walk in to any meeting. -- Call for more information.
site_schedule: Meetings: Vary by location -- Phone: Varies; Website and Voicemail: Daily 24 hours
